'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{lax3}}.

==Background==
==Points of interest==

* Apathy Resonator, aka. the Memory Hoarder's Organ.

==Characters==
* [[Fyonlecg]], an archmage of Eora.
* [[Memory Hoarder]].

== Loot ==

* [[Heldr's Horn]]: Found on the corpse lying beside the stone slab with the Eye symbol on it.
*[[The Left Hand of the Obscured]]: Looted from the Memory Hoarder.
*[[Unusual Egg|Egg]]: Inside the Mouth Organ. When you return to the [[Temple of Revelation]] it hatches to [[Retina]].
